sections.title: Privacy Policy
sections.content: Your privacy is important to us. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy

sections.title: Terms of Service
sections.content: By using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these terms of service.

sections.title: Return Policy
sections.content: If you are not satisfied, you may return the item within 30 days of receipt for a full refund.

sections.title: Shipping Policy
sections.content: We offer worldwide shipping with tracking. Orders are processed within 1-2 business days and shipped via reliable carriers.

sections.title: Warranty Policy
sections.content: All our products comes with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects.
